column4: Outbound Harrodsburg Rd at Bob O Link Dr
Outbound Richmond Rd at Fontaine Rd.
N Limestone between Barr St and Mechanic St
column5: Right lane blocked due to necessary construction.  Traffic impact is minimal, but use added caution.

column4: Please be patient at signalized intersections.
Signals are timed for much higher traffic volumes than our streets are currently experiencing.
Although waits on side streets may seem long, once the main streets are accessed, travel should be faster with much less delays than under normal conditions.
